question: Q1. As per IS 800:2007, shear lag effects in flanges may be disregarded for outstand elements if
Q2. What is shear lag effect ?

answers.a: The phenomenon of non uniform bending stress not due to influence of shear strain induced on bending stresses in flanges
answers.b: The phenomenon of uniform bending stress not due to influence of shear strain induced on bending stresses in flanges
answers.c: The phenomenon of uniform bending stress due to influence of shear strain induced on bending stresses in flanges
answers.d: The phenomenon of non uniform bending stress due to influence of shear strain induced on bending stresses in flanges
